issue.title: Move ValueVector test from Drill project
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-51](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-51). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are some simple tests that should be moved from the Drill project.
